segments.text: Are you free this evening , Li ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid I ’ m busy tonight . I ’ m having dinner with friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a pity . I wanted to go for a drink with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about tomorrow ? Are you doing anything tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I haven ’ t got any plans .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shall we go out tomorrow then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ? Sounds good to me .
segments.speaker: S1
